name: Riverstone Atelier
description: Seasonal tasting menus highlighting mountain botanicals and charcoal-fired techniques overlooking the Mtkvari riverbend.

menuHighlights.name: Charred Adjika Beetroot
menuHighlights.description: Coal-grilled beet with fermented blackberry glaze.

menuHighlights.name: Amber Trout Mosaic
menuHighlights.description: River trout cured in spruce oil with chilled tarragon nage.

menuHighlights.name: Gin-Tonic Sorbet
menuHighlights.description: Foraged juniper granité with citrus blossom foam.

menuHighlights.name: Coal-Kissed Lamb Saddle
menuHighlights.description: Wild herbs, ember-roasted garlic, river greens.

menuHighlights.name: Fermented Plum Tartlet
menuHighlights.description: Buckwheat shell, smoked plum caramel, spruce cream.

aiSummary: Best-in-class tasting studio with research kitchen pedigree; ideal for gastronomic tourism cohorts.

name: Botanical Nook
description: Greenhouse café serving biodynamic small plates, cold-brew tonics, and edible flower pastries.

menuHighlights.name: Labneh Meadow Bowl
menuHighlights.description: Cashew labneh, roasted carrots, candied buckwheat.

menuHighlights.name: Chilled Pine Tea
menuHighlights.description: Nitro-infused pine needle brew with citrus pearls.

menuHighlights.name: Citrus Blossom Tart
menuHighlights.description: Gluten-free sable with chamomile custard.

menuHighlights.name: Mushroom Moss Toast
menuHighlights.description: Cultured butter, thyme soil, microgreens.

menuHighlights.name: Lavender Kefir Float
menuHighlights.description: Wildflower kefir over lavender ice with honey shards.

aiSummary: Energetic daylight venue for remote creators, featuring high-fiber brunch boards and adaptogenic tonics.

name: Forge & Flame BBQ Lab
description: Experimental smokehouse blending Caucasian wood-fire tradition with Texas craft barbecue science.

menuHighlights.name: Adjika Brisket
menuHighlights.description: 16-hour smoked beef with pomegranate glaze.

menuHighlights.name: Suluguni Cornbread
menuHighlights.description: Smoked cheese cornbread with wildflower honey butter.

menuHighlights.name: Black Garlic Pickles
menuHighlights.description: House ferment flight with smoked salt.

aiSummary: Ideal for protein-heavy itineraries, offering data-backed smoke profiles and traceable sourcing.

name: Night Market 88
description: Lantern-lit hawker alley with rotating chefs from Seoul, Saigon, and Singapore offering small-plate flights.

menuHighlights.name: Gochujang Cauliflower
menuHighlights.description: Tempura florets with kimchi caramel.

menuHighlights.name: Saigon Pho Bites
menuHighlights.description: Compressed pho cubes with aromatic beef glaze.

menuHighlights.name: Sichuan Gelato
menuHighlights.description: Mala spiced ice cream with citrus dust.

aiSummary: Vibrant option for nocturnal explorers; static dataset ties each stall to unique sentiment scores.

name: Aurora Rooftop Observatory
description: Skyline lounge pairing cloud cocktails with astronomer-led stargazing and ambient downtempo sets.

menuHighlights.name: Osmium Oyster Trio
menuHighlights.description: Smoked, pickled, and foam-finished oyster flight.

menuHighlights.name: Cloud Citrus Highball
menuHighlights.description: Nitro highball with yuzu vapor garnish.

menuHighlights.name: Graphene Tuna Crudo
menuHighlights.description: Compressed tuna with activated sesame soil.

aiSummary: Choice for celebratory itineraries needing skyline visuals and pescatarian-forward menus.

name: Harborline Canteen
description: Maritime-inspired communal counter with smoked mussels, sourdough chowders, and kelp tonics.

menuHighlights.name: Smoked Mussel Toast
menuHighlights.description: Black bread, dill aioli, charcoal oil.

menuHighlights.name: Kelp Chowder
menuHighlights.description: Creamy soup with sunflower cream and potato pearls.

menuHighlights.name: Sea Buckthorn Tonic
menuHighlights.description: House-fermented kefir soda with kelp bitters.

aiSummary: Great for conscious travelers seeking midday seafood with measurable waste-diversion metrics.

name: Nomad's Table
description: Desert-inspired kitchen merging Levantine spices with Caucasian grains in a slow-dining format.

menuHighlights.name: Saffron Khinkali
menuHighlights.description: Hand-pinched dumplings with chickpea & preserved lemon.

menuHighlights.name: Desert Ash Bread
menuHighlights.description: Smoked ash flatbread with labneh butter.

menuHighlights.name: Rose Pistachio Malabi
menuHighlights.description: Cardamom custard with date molasses.

aiSummary: Popular among cultural delegates seeking narrative-driven meals with halal accreditation.

name: Pixel Pantry
description: AR-ready café with projection-mapped latte art, 24/7 study pods, and edible-ink pastries.

menuHighlights.name: Nitro Grapefruit Cold Brew
menuHighlights.description: Cascara nitro brew with citrus foam.

menuHighlights.name: Hologram Latte
menuHighlights.description: Projection-mapped art latte with oat milk.

menuHighlights.name: Neon Mochi Donut
menuHighlights.description: Gluten-free mochi donut with yuzu glaze.

aiSummary: Always-open study refuge with energy dashboards and AR-first UX; perfect for hackathon crews.

name: Juniper Test Kitchen
description: Research-forward R&D lab blending biophilic design with algorithmic menu sequencing.

menuHighlights.name: Fermented Cedar Broth
menuHighlights.description: Clarified cedar with koji custard pearls.

menuHighlights.name: Juniper Vapor Pasta
menuHighlights.description: Extruded pasta finished under aromatic vapor dome.

menuHighlights.name: AI-Paired Dessert Flight
menuHighlights.description: Data-personalized dessert trio.

aiSummary: Anchor venue for thesis demonstrations linking IoT sensors, AI pairing, and culinary craft.

name: Cobalt Espresso & Bakes
description: Micro-bakery and espresso lab focused on single-origin beans and laminated dough masterclasses.

menuHighlights.name: Midnight Cappuccino
menuHighlights.description: Smoky espresso with cardamom dust.

menuHighlights.name: Twice-Baked Pistachio Croissant

menuHighlights.name: Blue Pea Cold Foam
menuHighlights.description: Butterfly pea infusion with oat cold foam.

aiSummary: High-throughput café for daily rituals; POS data ready for forecasting labs.

name: Ember & Oak
description: Farmhouse kitchen pairing fermented pantry staples with hearth-driven mains from regenerative farms.

menuHighlights.name: Wildflower Khachapuri
menuHighlights.description: Fermented dough, seasonal greens, aged cheese.

menuHighlights.name: Ember Lamb Shoulder
menuHighlights.description: Clay-pot lamb with smoked carrot puree.

menuHighlights.name: Sunflower Honey Cake
menuHighlights.description: Layered cake with pollen cream.

name: Solstice Supper Club
description: Invitation-only supper tracing solar calendar rituals with immersive projection storytelling.

menuHighlights.name: Solstice Ember Broth
menuHighlights.description: Smoked broth served with projection-mapped herbs.

menuHighlights.name: Forager's Atlas
menuHighlights.description: Course featuring 12 micro dishes linked to zodiac.

menuHighlights.name: Lunar Honey Sphere
menuHighlights.description: Nitro dessert with honeycomb core.

aiSummary: Experiential dining for limited cohorts; data suitable for narrative UX research.

name: Copper Yard Smokehouse
description: Live-fire smokehouse with oak embers, pasture beef, and pickling bar steps from the tram depot.

menuHighlights.name: Ember Brisket Plate
menuHighlights.description: 14-hour smoked brisket with adjika molasses.

menuHighlights.name: Burnt-End Khachapuri
menuHighlights.description: Suluguni boat topped with charred burnt ends.

menuHighlights.name: Pickle Flight
menuHighlights.description: Seasonal ferments with smoked salt.

menuHighlights.name: Smoked Peach BBQ Wings
menuHighlights.description: Charred wings, peach glaze, house ranch.

aiSummary: Great for carnivore groups; still offers gluten-free plates and outdoor seating for smoke-sensitive guests.

name: Harbor Oyster Room
description: Raw bar and champagne lounge overlooking the funicular dock, with tide-to-table sourcing and DJ vinyl nights.

menuHighlights.name: Black Sea Oyster Flight
menuHighlights.description: Six oysters with citrus ponzu and dill ice.

menuHighlights.name: Charred Octopus
menuHighlights.description: Smoked paprika rub, preserved lemon mash.

menuHighlights.name: Champagne Granite
menuHighlights.description: Palate cleanser with bergamot zest.

menuHighlights.name: Lobster Brioche Roll
menuHighlights.description: Brown butter lobster, dill aioli, brioche bun.

aiSummary: Ideal for seafood-forward dates; proximity to tram makes it easy to combine with waterfront walks.

name: Kinetic Ramen Lab
description: Neon-lit broth lab with table-side tare tastings, vinyl hip-hop sets, and midnight ramen drops.

menuHighlights.name: Black Garlic Tonkotsu
menuHighlights.description: 12-hour broth with burnt garlic oil and soft egg.

menuHighlights.name: Miso Tofu Mazemen
menuHighlights.description: Dry-style ramen with sesame tare and crispy tofu.

menuHighlights.name: Yuzu Shio Shot
menuHighlights.description: Tare tasting served in ceramic shooters.

menuHighlights.name: Spicy Sesame Karaage
menuHighlights.description: Crispy chicken, sesame chili dust, lime.

name: Atlas Family Table
description: Sunlit canteen with indoor playground, weekend brunch buffet, and kids cooking classes.

menuHighlights.name: Adjika Chicken Waffles
menuHighlights.description: Corn waffle with honey adjika glaze.

menuHighlights.name: Kids Bakeshop Bench

menuHighlights.name: Supra Skillet

menuHighlights.name: Banana Bread French Toast

aiSummary: Best for families needing space and predictability; brunch buffet keeps wait times low.

name: Terrace Cyclist Cafe
description: Bike-in espresso bar with repair stand, power outlets, and slow-carb bowls overlooking the park loop.

menuHighlights.description: Steeped cascara with orange peel.

menuHighlights.name: Quinoa Power Bowl
menuHighlights.description: Roasted veg, pickled onions, tahini drizzle.

menuHighlights.name: Oat Espresso Shake

menuHighlights.name: Pistachio Energy Bites
menuHighlights.description: Date, pistachio, cacao nib clusters.

aiSummary: Reliable laptop spot and meetup hub for cyclists; vegan-friendly fuel and early hours.

name: Makers Den

menuHighlights.name: Miso Mushroom Toast
